quotes.quote: Tiny acts of kindness can have BIG results.
Tiny steps will get you to your goal months and months sooner. A little is better than a lot.
Tiny drops of experiences collated from the roof of our journeys in life becomes the ocean upon which we sail to greatness.
The tiny cost of failure...is dwarfed by the huge cost of not trying.
A microscopic phantom of the universe; this is all that we are able to be.
A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.
Tiny tweaks can lead to big changes.
Tiny fists can hurt quite a lot when they hit you in the face.
A tiny fly can choke a big man.
A tiny hole can empty a great big bucket.
The spark from a tiny star can ignite the plains.
It is often the tiny steps that define the big moments in our dreams.
From tiny, tiny waves of joy, one gets to the ocean of happiness, which is called bliss.
Every tiny part of us cries out against the idea of dying, and hopes to live forever.
One tiny flame could make so many other flames; one tiny flame could set afire a whole world.
It is in the tiny struggles of individual peoples that the great movements of history are most truly revealed.
No matter how tiny you look, you can lead huge men if you have what the huge men don't have.
The idea of tiny changes cumulated over many steps is an immensely powerful idea, capable of explaining an enormous range of things that would be otherwise inexplicable.
One way to compensate for a tiny brain is to pretend to be dead.
The tiny fish enjoy themselves in the sea.
Even a tiny step is one step closer to where you are going.
Even if there's a tiny tiny chance, isn't that worth going for it?
If every tiny flower wanted to be a rose, spring would lose its loveliness.
A tiny remnant of a big thing is better than a whole little thing.
What do you think, would not one tiny crime be wiped out by thousands of good deeds?
The tiny, initial clue ... by allowing us to imagine what we do not know, stimulates a desire for knowledge.
A man isn't tiny or giant enough to defeat anything.
Anything which makes you feel tiny also motivates you to be big!
